name: 劉祐綸
objective:
本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，主要以策略管理與營運模式為核心，在每個個案討論當中，同時由策略管理、人力資源管理、組織管理、服務管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生從策略的角度，學習這些管理功能的整合與營運模式，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
The Integrated Strategy Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Strategy, HRM, Organization Management, and service Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.
